result.purpose: Responsible for handling various discovery-related operations including announcements, events, feature banners, home banners, products, and tokens.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each file handles specific aspects of the discovery service, promoting separation of concerns and maintainability.

internal/handlers/discovery/announcement.purpose: Handles announcement-related operations such as creating, deleting, and listing banners.

internal/handlers/discovery/event.go.purpose: Handles event-related operations for discovery services.

internal/handlers/discovery/feature_bann.purpose: Handles feature banner operations including creation, deletion, and retrieval by version.

internal/handlers/discovery/generic.go.purpose: Handles discovery-related functionalities such as listing social platforms, studios, categories, and image uploads.

internal/handlers/discovery/helpers.go.purpose: Contains helper functions for validating and checking duplicates in widget layouts for discovery handlers.

internal/handlers/discovery/home_banner..purpose: Handles operations related to home banners in the discovery service.

internal/handlers/discovery/layout.go.purpose: Handles discovery-related functionalities and validations for widgets in the application.

internal/handlers/discovery/product.go.purpose: Handles product-related operations for the discovery service.

internal/handlers/discovery/product.help.purpose: Handles mapping and copying of product and social platform data for discovery features.

internal/handlers/discovery/tokens.go.purpose: Handles requests for trending tokens in the discovery domain.
